sentences.en: Business interests are incompatible with public office.
sentences.cn: 商业利益与公职不可兼得。

sentences.en: I don’t know why they ever got married. They’re totally incompatible.
sentences.cn: 我不知道他们为什么结婚，他们根本合不来。

sentences.en: If the drug and IV solution are incompatible, use two glucose barriers.
sentences.cn: 如果药物与静脉所输的液体是配伍禁忌的, 就要用两次葡萄糖屏障液.

sentences.en: Late hours are incompatible with health.
Pettiness was incompatible not only with their personalities, but with their presences.
sentences.cn: 谨小慎微不但同他们的个性, 而且跟他们的仪表都是不相容的.

sentences.en: Politeness and truth are often mutually incompatible.
sentences.cn: 礼貌和实话往往互不相容。

sentences.en: Scepticism and trust are not necessarily incompatible.
sentences.cn: 怀疑与信任未必不能共存.

sentences.en: She asked for a divorce because they were utterly incompatible.
sentences.cn: 她请求离婚,因为他们完全合不来.

sentences.en: Speed and safety are not necessarily incompatible.
sentences.cn: 速度和安全未必不相容。

sentences.en: The married couple argued incessantly and finally decided to separate because they are incompatible.
sentences.cn: 这对夫妻不断争吵,由于实在无法相容,最后他们决定分手.
两份报道所说的并不一致.

sentences.en: The two things seem to me incompatible.
sentences.cn: 在我看来,这两件事是彼此不能相容的.

sentences.en: They are utterly incompatible with each other.
They feel strongly that their religion is incompatible with the political system.
sentences.cn: 他们强烈感受到他们的宗教信仰与政治体制不相称。

sentences.en: This made its mini-computers incompatible with its mainframes.
sentences.cn: 这就使得它的微型计算机与它的大型主机不兼容。
我们根本不能和谐相处。

words.tran_cn: 相反的,不一致的,对立的

trans.tran_cn: 不相容，矛盾，不能同时成立的，（与某物）不匹配，[医]配伍禁忌的
trans.tran_en: two things that are incompatible cannot exist or be accepted together
